  • custom_df (pd.DataFrame) – custom dataframe containing the new column to be added to the original dataframe

calculates technical indicators and uses stockstats package to add technical inidactors.

adds vix from Yahoo Finance.

prepare_ml_data(train_data, feature_list)

Splits data to X (features) and y (labels)

Parameters

  • train_data (pd.DataFrame) – data to be splitted.

  • feature_list – a list of features to be used for training

Raises

Exception – Raised when provided data does not contain return values

Returns

dataframe that has the features pd.DataFrame : dataframe that has the return values.

Return type

pd.DataFrame
